timeline.bodyText:
Don't catch the command syntax exception. Let brigadier handle it (you can make the method throw it and be fine).
Reason being the command manager will return a richer message when you attempt to get the ServerPlayerEntity if you are running as a server and fail for you.
timeline.author: i509VCB
i509VCB

timeline.message:
Merge branch '1.16' into dim-v2

# Conflicts:
#	build.gradle
#	fabric-command-api-v1/src/main/java/net/fabricmc/fabric/mixin/command/MixinMinecraftDedicatedServer.java
#	fabric-registry-sync-v0/src/main/java/net/fabricmc/fabric/mixin/registry/sync/MixinIdRegistry.java
#	fabric-registry-sync-v0/src/main/java/net/fabricmc/fabric/mixin/registry/sync/MixinLevelStorageSession.java
Re add default placer's, the example mod includes a test dim that currently marks the world as experimental

timeline.author: i509VCB

timeline.bodyText: how about something like DimensionTeleportHandler or just TeleportHandler? EntityPlacer is very vague and it leads to vague class names in user code
timeline.author: Reoseah
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,16 +23,18 @@
 
 /**
  * Responsible for placing an Entity once they have entered a dimension.
- * Stored by a FabricDimensionType, and used in Entity::changeDimension.
+ * used in Entity::changeDimension.
+ *
+ * @deprecated Experimental feature, may be removed or changed without further notice due to potential changes to Dimensions in subsequent versions.
  *
  * @see FabricDimensions
- * @see FabricDimensionType
  */
+@Deprecated
 @FunctionalInterface
 public interface EntityPlacer {

replies.bodyText: Right before this place in javadoc word used is not capitalized at the start of a sentence
replies.author: Reoseah

replies.bodyText: This doesnt actually have anything to do with the teleportation. Its just handling the spawn (location, and possibly portal creation) of the entity in the other world.
replies.author: modmuss50

replies.bodyText:
For me, EntityPlacer can be anything related to entity spawning, entities summoning other entities for attack etc
TeleportationSomething is significantly clearer.
Anything that mentions "teleport" or "teleportation" will be better than that
replies.author: Reoseah
